sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Microsoft ( MSFT ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.1%.
Year to date, Microsoft registers a 1.8% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Apple ( AAPL ), trading down 1.6%.
Apple is showing a gain of 5.6% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 0.6%, and Chevron ( CVX ), trading up 1.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
